Description: The S-100 Polara is based on the Guild S-100 guitar from the '70s. Boasting a body made of mahogany with a sleek offset design, and combined with a special pair of humbucking pickups, the S-100 Polara is primed for classic hard rock. Armed with a pair of HB-1 humbucking pickups, when you plug in your Guild S-100 Polara you will be rewarded with a wide range of classic tones. As music was evolving into harder and heavier sounds, Guild released these higher-output pickups to ensure players could get the most out of their S-100. The HB1 humbucker pickups are quite capable of everything from articulate cleans to down-tuned riffing. And the S-100 Polara is sonically flexible, thanks to individual volume and tone controls for each pickup. On top of great looks and tone, the Guild S-100 Polara sports high-quality features for years of reliable performance. Like the binding on the rosewood fretboard, which looks great but also adds an ultra-smooth playing feel. And Grover Sta-Tite die-cast tuners offer exceptional tuning stability and precision. Body Type: Solidbody Body Shape: Polara Left-/Right-handed: Right-handed Number of Strings: 6 Body Material: Mahogany Body Finish: Urethane Color: Black Neck Material: Mahogany Neck Shape: Vintage Soft "U" Fingerboard Material: Rosewood, 12" radius Fingerboard Inlay: Blocks Number of Frets: 22 Scale Length: 24.75" Nut Width: 1.650" Bridge/Tailpiece: Tune-O-Matic bridge Tuners: Grover Sta-Tite die-cast tuners Number of Pickups: 2 Neck Pickup: HB-1 Humbucker Bridge Pickup: HB-1 Humbucker Controls: 2 x volume, 2 x tone, 3-way selector Shipping Policy: We ship Fedex or USPS in the continental USA free. Alaska, Hawaii and US territories have a $40.00 charge. International shipping is by USPS Priority Mail International. International buyers pay all costs involved in shipping and import including all transport costs, duties, fees, taxes or other costs. Return Policy: 30 days, buyer pays all return shipping costs.
Title: Guild S-100 Polara Black Solid Body Electric Guitar w/Bag
ConditionDescription: This guitar is set up and ready to play, everything works. It came to us directly from Guild, and is in un-played condition with only surface marks from handling. The action is set at 3/32" at the 12th fret, the electronics sound great, and the truss rod is active. We are selling it as manufacturer refurbished with a 90 day factory warranty and Guild gig bag.
